revised_title: Edward Waymouth Reid: A Pioneering Physiologist and Physico-Chemical Investigator
tldr: Edward Waymouth Reid was a pioneering physiologist and physico-chemical investigator who made significant contributions to the study of electrical activity in the heart, absorption in living tissues, and the understanding of physico-chemical processes in living organisms. His work laid the foundation for modern research in electrocardiography and biophysics.
